title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-1.9 - Tuition assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-1.9 - Tuition assistance

State Regulations

An institution may apply for and award tuition assistance
for students enrolled in higher education opportunity programs under the
provisions of section
6451
of the

Education Law. Institutions shall not be reimbursed for more than 50 percent of
the tuition charged for the academic program related to the student's program
of study. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
152-1.9

Adopted

New

York State Register September 27, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 39, eff. 9/27/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
